reviewText: You must watch this! Very well made!
My kids love watching Ray. My older son (11 years), wants to learn to share his faith the way Ray does. I highly recommend! :)
Ray Comfort is excellent as always.
This was an excellent documentary. I would highly recommend it.

Many parallels between the days of Noah and our modern world are revealed in this intriguing half-hour video.  Combining on-the-street interviews to get people's candid opinions on Noah and many spiritual topics along with signs of the last days that foretell the coming of Christ, Ray Comfort has created another must-see for people of all faiths and levels of belief to consider.  It's so important for everyone to see films like these because they help us all to think about the most important questions in life and ponder what will happen to us after we die.

Deceitful  ---This movie is just a play on words.
They are using Jesus prediction( in Matthew 24:37,38 or Luke 17:26,27 ) concerning the end times.
However,  the cover on the DVD showing the flood and the ark is not what is on the DVD. One could say, this is bearing false witness.
Movie; A street evangelist asking random people if they lie, steal, profane the name of GOD, etc.
 Deceitful cover;  bearing false witness
 Deceitful cover;  stealing my money (and time) by bearing false witness.
Using Noahs (Gods Prophet Genesis 6, and preacher 2 Peter 2:5 ) name to trick people into what they are buying.

You want the Truth?  Everything from Ray Comfort, and Ken Ham comes from God, -I say that -because they are fully submitted to the Lord, so that God can use them for His purposes.  They spend their lives making resources that help make God Known to the people.  All their resources on their websites, living-waters, and also answers-in-genesis..-have the answers you are looking for.  -If you are really seeking and you are tried of all the LIES from this world, then check out their stuff -because it speaks the TRUTH!  -Thanks you guys for how hard you work, and insults you endure, -in order to get God's Truth out there.  They make movies and books that give evidencethat prove what God says is True.  They are using the gifts God gave them, to make Him known.  -This is what we should all be doing-with whatever gifts God gives us.  Love all of you-God bless you.
EXCELLENT!  Gets straight to the point!  Makes people think without the guilt trip!  Well done.
I love Ray Comfort and his ministry.  But not quite what I expected (I thought it would be a little more about the bible story of Noah) - but still pretty good.

Good movie.  Was expecting the Biblical story, but appreciated the interviews too.  Ray Comfort is a master at getting people to think deeply about serious issues!!  And Ken Ham is a very good speaker/teacher!
Gave to a friend and he said it was helpful.
This is a great DVD with an even better message!  I look forward to more of these videos from Ray Comfort, God bless!

Don't expect much biblical accuracy.  This movie hacked the Word to pieces. Read the account in Genesis for your self - it doesn't take a scholar to see how they turned an artistic license into a slaughter of the truth.
Great 30 video... great way to see the sinful behavior and compared with the prophecies of the ends of times.
